description: I develop full-stack solutions with Angular and Java (Spring) for a German client, collaborate in international and Agile teams, create reusable Storybook components, implemente automated tests with Cypress, and use CI/CD pipelines in a Linux environment.

dates: Complutense University of Madrid | Feb 2025- Feb 2026
company: Master in Big Data, Data Science, and AI
description: I built ML and Deep Learning models in Python (Scikit-learn, TensorFlow/Keras), applied NLP with Hugging Face and BERT, created Tableau dashboards, and deployed solutions using APIs and cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Colab.

I applied Python for data manipulation and Machine Learning, implemented Data Structures and Algorithms in Java (OOP), modeled and queried SQL databases, and performed statistical analysis in R to solve problems in human anatomy and physiology.
